      • index

        public void index(java.lang.String json,
                  java.lang.String collection,
                  java.lang.String object)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Index a document
        Parameters:
        json -
        collection - (name of the collection) Might be product_en or product_fr or any name of the index container
        object - That corresponds to the name of the entity to be indexed as defined in the indice file (product.json). In this case it will be product
        id -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
